CustomField.description:
This field is used in email templates. The Formula checks the following:
1. If customer first name is known, first name is used 2. If customer last name is known, last name (with salutation if known) is used 3 'lezer' (reader) is used
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.FirstName)), Contact.FirstName,
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.LastName)),
CASE(Contact.GenderIdentity, 'M', 'meneer ', 'V', 'mevrouw ', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MiddleName)),UPPER(LEFT( Contact.MiddleName , 1)) & MID( Contact.MiddleName , 2, LEN( Contact.MiddleName )) & ' ', '') & Contact.LastName,
'lezer' ) )
CustomField.label: Email Template Salutation
